item.title: Anima
item.author: hello@ceceppa.me (Alessandro Senese)
item.description: Tired of wrestling with complex animation code in Godot? Anima is here to rescue you. I’ve created this powerful add-on to streamline the process of crafting captivating UI animations. With over 89 pre-built animations and 33 easing options at your fingertips, you can effortlessly bring your UI to life. From simple fades to intricate sequences, Anima offers unparalleled flexibility and control. item.title: React Native AMA
item.author: hello@ceceppa.me (Alessandro Senese)
item.description: I created AMA to address the challenges developers often face when building accessible mobile apps. By providing a comprehensive suite of components, hooks, and guidelines, AMA simplifies the process of ensuring your app is usable by everyone. I believe that accessibility should be a priority for every developer, and AMA is my contribution to making that a reality. Documentation Source Code
